login_subtitle: Sign in to continue your sports journey

UserProfile.password_invalid: يجب أن تحتوي كلمة المرور على حرف كبير واحد على الأقل، وحرف صغير واحد، ورقم واحد. يجب أن تكون كلمة المرور بين 8 و20 حرفًا.

hero_description: ArenaBook provides you with the best arena booking experience. Search, compare, and book in minutes with simple and secure steps.
features_subtitle: We provide you with the best arena booking experience with advanced features and excellent customer service
feature_diverse_arenas_desc: Discover a wide range of arenas for different sports. Choose what suits your needs.
feature_secure_payment_desc: Enjoy a safe and reliable payment process through multiple electronic payment gateways.
feature_fast_booking_desc: Book your favorite arena with simple and quick steps, avoiding long waiting times.
feature_24_7_desc: Book at any time of the day, ArenaBook is always available to serve you.
feature_community_desc: Join an active sports community and share your experience with other players.
feature_guarantee_desc: All arenas are certified and quality-assured to ensure an excellent experience.
how_it_works_subtitle: Simple steps to book your favorite arena in minutes
how_it_works_step1_desc: Use the search engine to find available arenas in your area
how_it_works_step2_desc: Select the date and time that suit you from the schedule
how_it_works_step3_desc: Complete the secure payment process through electronic payment gateways
how_it_works_step4_desc: Receive booking confirmation via email and text messages
testimonials_subtitle: Thousands of users trust us to book their favorite arenas
testimonial_text_1: Excellent support and smooth process. I no longer find it difficult to book my favorite arenas. Great experience!
testimonial_text_2: Great interface and a large selection of arenas. Highly recommend it to any athlete looking for easy booking.
testimonial_text_3: ArenaBook has completely changed the way I book arenas! Fast, easy, and secure. The best booking platform I've used.
cta_title: Ready to Start Booking Your Favorite Arena?
cta_description: Join thousands of users who trust us to book their favorite arenas. Start now and enjoy the best booking experience.
footer_description: The #1 arena booking platform. Book your favorite arena easily and quickly.
reservations_error_load: An error occurred while loading reservations
pending_approval_message: Your owner account registration was successful. Your account is now pending admin approval.
pending_approval_documents_message: Our admin team is reviewing your submitted documents (National ID front, National ID back, and selfie with ID). You will be notified once your account is approved.
pending_approval_step1: Wait for admin review of your documents
pending_approval_step2: You will receive a notification once your account is approved
pending_approval_step3: Once approved, you can log in and start managing your arenas
pending_owner_requests_subtitle: Review and approve new owner requests
no_pending_requests: No pending requests at the moment
name: Name
rejected_account_message: Your account registration has been rejected
rejected_account_description: Unfortunately, your owner account registration has been rejected by the admin team.
rejected_account_documents_message: Your submitted documents (National ID front, National ID back, and selfie with ID) did not meet our verification requirements. This could be due to unclear images, incorrect information, or missing documents.
rejected_account_step1: Please contact our admin team to understand why your account was rejected
rejected_account_step2: You may need to resubmit your documents with clearer images or correct information
rejected_account_step3: Our admin team will guide you through the process to get your account approved
about_subtitle: A leading platform for booking sports arenas easily and securely
about_mission_text: We aim to facilitate the process of booking sports arenas and make them accessible to everyone easily and securely. We seek to build an active sports community that connects arena owners and players in one place.
about_vision_text: Providing the best booking experience for sports arenas through an easy-to-use and secure platform. We work to support sports in Egypt and encourage everyone to practice sports activities.
about_values_subtitle: The principles we believe in and work through
about_value1_text: We ensure the security of all transactions and protect user data with the highest security standards.
about_value2_text: Simple and fast booking process, you can book your favorite arena in minutes.
about_value3_text: We work to build an active sports community that connects players and arena owners.
about_value4_text: We are committed to providing the best services and ensuring the quality of arenas displayed on the platform.
about_value5_text: We use the latest technologies to provide a distinguished and innovative user experience.
about_value6_text: We believe in full transparency in all our transactions and services.
about_why_subtitle: We provide you with the best sports arena booking experience
about_why1_text: Simple and intuitive user interface that makes the search and booking process easy for everyone.
about_why2_text: Secure and protected payment system that ensures the security of all your financial transactions.
about_why3_text: Choose from a large and diverse collection of sports arenas throughout Egypt.
about_why4_text: Support team available 24/7 to help you with any inquiry or issue.
about_cta_text: Start your sports journey with us and book your favorite arena easily and securely
